data.text: Tweduampɔn, Onyankopɔn, Awurade no kasa,
Onyankopɔn hyerɛn fi Sion
Yɛn Nyankopɔn reba nanso ɔrenyɛ komm;
Ɔfrɛ ɔsorosoro ne asase,
Ɔka se, “Boaboa nnipa a wɔatew wɔn ho no ano ma me;
Ɔsoro pae mu ka ne trenee,
“Muntie, me nkurɔfo, na mɛkasa,
Merenka mo anim wɔ mo afɔrebɔde
Anantwinini a wofi mo mfuw so
efisɛ kwae mu aboa biara yɛ me de,
Minim anomaa biara a ɔwɔ mmepɔw no so,
Sɛ ɔkɔm dee me a, anka merenka nkyerɛ mo;
Mewe anantwinini nam,
Momfa aseda afɔre mma Onyankopɔn,
na momfrɛ me hiada;
Nanso amumɔyɛfo de, Onyankopɔn bisa wɔn se,
Mukyi me nkyerɛkyerɛ,
Sɛ muhu ɔkorɔmfo a mode mo ho bɔ no;
Mode mo ano yɛ bɔne,
Mokasa tia mo nuabarima bere biara
Moayɛ eyinom nyinaa; nanso manka hwee,
“Munnwen eyi ho, mo a mo werɛ fi Onyankopɔn,
Nea ɔbɔ aseda afɔre no hyɛ me anuonyam,
